name: The Silent Planet
description:
Story (short of):

You are stranded on a planet after your ship malfunctioned during your hybernation. The emergency teleporter sent you straight into an underground mining facility.

Controls:
  • Movement: A, D
  • Jump: SPACE
  • Dash: Shift or Right Click
  • Duck (falling down some on platforms)
  • Change weapon: 1 (default), 2, 3
  • Interaction: F
  • Shoot: CTRL
  • Escape: ESC

Some of your movements, weapons will be aquired during the gamplay. Watch out for upgrade capsules and checkpoints.

Enemies will all respawn upon death and reloading last checkpoints!

Bugs

Crashes are possible, most likely on death - level reload.
